issue.title: [CF 1519] Dragging Spells in Meta Priority LIst Will Not Release from Mouse Cursor
issue.body:
When dragging spells in the meta icon's priority list, the spell will not release from the mouse cursor after you have release your finger from the mouse click.  The spell will stay tied to the mouse cursor moving up and down as the cursor moves screwing up your priority.  The only work around I have found is to /reload when you have your priority set.


> Posted by CurseForge user daemon9 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1519 | Raw

comments.body:
Unable to reproduce. Please post the export string of the meta icon.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Nevermind - you must have been dragging the icon preview thumbnail and not the actual dropdown menu.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

That's right, it was the icon and not the spell in the drop down menu.


> Posted by CurseForge user daemon9
